patterns: Tell me something I don't know!
responses: Nagpur is also know as Orange City
Nagpur is the winter capital of Maharashtra
The Red Fort was once white
A rainbow at night is called a moonbow
There are an estimated 400 million dogs in the world!
Oxygen is the most common element in the Earth's crust.
The billionth digit of pi is 9.
In a room of 23 people there’s a 50% chance that two people have the same birthday.
If you shuffle a deck of cards properly, it’s more than likely that the exact order of the cards you get has never been seen before in the whole history of the universe.
Saturn has 150 moons
Many hands make light work, teamwork is vital for a student
Remember, Honesty is the best policy
The grass always seems greener on the other side of the fence
Don’t judge a book by its cover
Actions always speak louder than words
Empty barrels make the most noise
The early bird catches the worm
The squeaky wheel gets the grease, always get your concerns cleared
It’s better to be safe than sorry
Learn to walk before you run, baby steps young padawan
Better late than never, get those submissions in
It’s no use crying over spilt milk, always look forward
Do or do not, there is no try!

patterns: Do you have any music recommendations
